name: Amy Bolin
comment: Amazing day at Area 51!  This place is top-notch. The staff is friendly, funny, and safety conscious.  The course is set up in different sections so you are playing on different fields for each game. Plenty of shade and water for each intermission.  The rental equipment seems well cared for and everything was clean, streamlined and we'll organized. For the price of a movie and consessions you can play for hours on end. Our new summer favorite.

name: Collin Herold
comment: I don't really know anything about paintball, I've played a few times. And I've never been here. But they fly a Valken flag, that's reason enough for 5 stars

name: Cindy Johnston
comment: This is a paintball field thats motto is FOR THE LOVE OF THE GAME!  and they mean it. I love it there.
